system_meta.core_concept: Geometric alignment is priority. Fonts are mechanically skewed (-12deg) rather than using native italics to ensure perfect parallel alignment with UI shapes.

primary.name: Electric Orange
primary.usage: CTAs, Active States, Hover Borders, Slider Thumbs

styles.display_style: Normal (Not Italic). Skew is strictly achieved via CSS transform: skewX(-12deg).

typography_usage.headers: Roboto Condensed, Black, Uppercase. Style: Normal. Transform: SkewX(-12deg).
typography_usage.body: Inter, Regular, Normal Style, No Skew.
typography_usage.price_tags: Roboto Condensed, Bold. Style: Normal. Transform: SkewX(-12deg). Color: Primary.

shape_logic.data_entry: Strictly Rectangular 0deg (Text Inputs, Price Inputs, Newsletter Form).

buttons.structure: Container skewed -12deg. Text inside must be counter-skewed (12deg) to appear upright. Font-style: Normal.

variants.primary: Background Orange (#FF6B00), Text Black, No Border.
variants.outline: Background Transparent, Border 2px White, Text White. Hover: Border Orange, Text Orange.

inputs_text.style: Transparent background, 1px Solid Border #333, White Text.

range_slider.thumb: Square shape, Orange background, Black border, Skewed -12deg to match track.

category_card.typography: Compact Titles (1.8rem). Normal Style + Skew Transform.
category_card.visuals: Grayscale image becomes Color on hover. Flash effect overlay on hover.

product_card.typography: Readable Inter title + Large Skewed Price (Normal style + Transform).
product_card.actions: Always visible row (Flexbox): 1. [Primary Btn: Add to Cart] + 2. [Outline Btn: Wishlist].

news_card.typography: Hybrid: Skewed Badges, Straight Body Text.

sidebar_filter.price_row: Two rectangular inputs (From/To) + One skewed range slider below.
